name: Butterfly Garden Mystery
description:
Welcome to Butterfly Garden Mystery! One of the best match 3 games of garden restoring, planting and decorating!

Explore magic garden scapes, match the butterflies, solve the brain quests and learn The Art of Magic with Aveline the Fairy and her best friend Momo the Puppy! Pave your way through a magic storyline full of unexpected twists!

In this free match three game your goal is to collect as many butterflies as you can while solving one quest after another. Solve the challenging tasks and group the butterflies 3 in a row. Meet the wizarding inhabitants and their cute pets, collect enchanted garden mania treasures and, of course, overcome numerous obstacles in order to succeed.

🌟Join the best restoring game to BECOME a QUEEN of butterfly garden!🌟

🔸 GAME HIGHLIGHTS 🔸
✿ Exciting match 3 levels: swap between 500+ match 3 levels while repairing the garden!
✿ Powerful Boosters: unique magic super boosters and exclusive combinations of butterflies!
✿ Unique gameplay: renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces with Aveline and her friends!
✿ Addictive gameplay: match three in row & free swap, restore and decorate the mystery garden escape! Become a part of a breathtaking free house matching scapes adventure!
✿ In-game characters: make friends, restore the garden and gain new experience together!
✿ Make your dream come true: restore a wonderful garden to its former glory.
✿ A super addicting game: you can even play offline!
✿ FTP Game: free-to-play mystery match 3 game.
✿ WIFI FREE: this colorful garden decorating game does not require Internet connection and you can play it for free immediately.
✿ Enjoy 250+ colourful designed butterfly quests.
✿ A cute pet: Momo the Puppy who is always with you to cheer you up.
✿ Daily bonuses: spin the Wheel of Fortune for FREE once in three days and get a guaranteed reward! The more often you visit this garden renovation game, the better the reward!
✿ Magic Dews: collect ingredients for potions and fill the bottle to receive a reward.
✿ 7+ Different Areas in the garden, each with unique structures: broken fountains, mysterious mazes, old mansions. Beat match-3 levels, restore and decorate different areas in the magic garden.
✿ A huge and beautiful adventure: discover all the secrets and garden mystery it holds!
✿ Amazing picture quality.

What’s the difference from other match 3 games?
- 5 games in one – Garden restore, garden repair, garden design/makeover, garden cleaning and garden decoration;
- 500+ interesting levels of butterfly match 3 farm garden game;
- 250+ magic quests to gain more experience;
- 8 fairy characters to make friends with;
- 7 unique amazing locations to investigate and restore;
- is a very fun and relaxing game.

Butterfly Match 3 Garden Mystery is FREE GAME to play: so, of course, it is free to download and start the adventure RIGHT NOW!

Also, this is an OFFLINE game: sooo...of course, IT RUNS OFFLINE, so you can play anywhere at any time, NO need Wifi or 4G.

This enchanted garden full of flowers 🌼 and butterflies will offer you unforgettable adventures. Game for garden design lovers and not only! That’s the greatest garden renovation & design adventure ever! Enjoy the hundreds of unique match-3 levels!

So, what are you waiting for?!
Download this one of the most fantastic match 3 games with garden design for FREE right now! Show off your garden designer skills! Indulge yourself in some gardening and build your own dream garden full of glory and beauty!
